    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccessLogCaptureRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route capturing requests and storing them in a RingBuffer.
    AccessLogCaptureRoute.AccessLogData
    POD for holding captured data relating to a request.
    AccessLogOutputRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route for outputting HTTP requests captured by AccessLogCaptureRoute.
    ContentTypes
    Helper class for handling content types consistently across management routes.
    DumpEnvRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route for allowing users to download a thread dump of the process.
    DumpSysPropsRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route for allowing users to download a thread dump of the process.
    HeapDumpRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route for allowing users to download a heap dump over HTTP.
    InFlightRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route for allowing users to download information about all HTTP requests currently being processed by the server.
    LogbackMgmtRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route for allowing users to pull and update logback levels.
    ManagementRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route for providing easy access to other "management" routes.
    ParametersRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route for allowing users to download a thread dump of the process.
    RingBuffer<T>
    A FIFO queue of bounded size that automatically removes the oldest item when adding a new one would exceed the capacity.
    ThreadDumpRoute
    A Vertx HTTP Server route for allowing users to download a thread dump of the process.
